name: Amazing Candy Legend - Match3 Yummy Jel
name_original: Amazing Candy Legend - Match3 Yummy Jel
description:
Amazing Candy Legend - Match3 Yummy Jel is a hexagon match-three game, which is sweet and addictive.
Eliminate candies to collect panels and bear cookies.
Challenge yourself to get 3 stars.
How to play:
1) Match 3 or more candies to eliminate them.
2) Collect panels by eliminating candy on top of it.
3) Make bear cookies fall down to transition point and collect it.

Features:
- It is easy, fun, and full of challenge.
- Up to 100 levels and several sweet scenes.
- Candy with clock provides extra time bonus.
- Light candy is able to eliminate a row of candies.
- Bomb can eliminate nine candies around it.
